entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince Rupert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 3:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 26 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -20.0°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h except 70 gusting to 90 near mainland valleys and inlets. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h except 70 gusting to 90 near mainland valleys and inlets early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind light except east 30 km/h over exposed coastal sections. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Windy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
